settings.title: George Krastev
settings.text:
Founder and CEO

George Krastev (Georgi Krastev) is originally from Europe and started VoltBike Electric Inc. in 2013 as a side project at his home garage in Coquitlam, BC, Canada. 7 years later, that side project has become a profitable, self-funded company with thousands of riders around North America.

Prior to VoltBike he was a successful web developer for various e-commerce companies the most significant of which is Best Buy Canada. He has a masterâ€™s degree in computer science and technology. He lives in Vancouver, BC with his wife and two daughters.

settings.title: Joe Fedilo
settings.text:
Senior Bike Mechanic

settings.title: Atta Dimitrova
settings.text:
Assistant Manager

Atta is valuable team member with many years of work experience in administration and customer relations sectors. No matter how tense a meeting, she effortlessly leaves everyone with a smile. She has a great ability to handle pressure and sudden deadlines.

Atta will be your go to person when you have issues, and she will make sure to resolve them as per your satisfaction.

settings.title: Erin Altstadt
settings.text: Erin joined the VoltBike team to meet the demand for the 2020 season. Holding down the customer support lines, Erin is essential part of our team. You can typically find her swimming, working out, and soon to be out on the trail with the rest of the VoltBike crew!

settings.title: Momchil Kutev
settings.text:
Web & Graphic Designer

Momchil splits his time between web development, product photography, and the design of marketing materials. In his spare time, he likes going for bike rides, taking photos, spending time with family and friends, and checking up on the Canucks.
